captions.text:
Crossfire in pydhonie
and dockyard road.

What do you think?
Who could've done this?
Only agnel sir can answer that.

He'll rot in jail for
the rest of his life.
Tell me, sir. Who was it?

What do you mean?
- I mean he tried to commit suicide.

What nonsense... - chauhan,
there's no dent on the car...

There was no accident
or brake failure.

They saw him drive
the car into the gorge.
You will have to tell me, agnel.
Why did you take such a big step?
Why did you try to commit suicide?

You're giving up at a time
when i need you the most.

Were you trying to evade
your duty or were you scared?

No sir... i was
trying to evade myself.

But i won't die so easily after
the trouble i've put this city into.

You're not responsible for what's
going on in the city, agnel.

Mumbai is dormant in
the sound of explosions.
And the reason behind it... is me.
I tried to lock horns with one man.

But today... the entire
city is paying the price.
This story began with sultan mirza.
If it wasn't for the floods...

...then sultan and
mumbai might've never met.
He got a job at the docks.

I heard that he was
paid only 25 paise...

...after working all
day in the furnace.

If you give me this
money then what about you?

Blessings. I'll thrive
on your blessings.

And with your blessings
someday i'll make it big.
That day he got a name.

His juvenile age and
innocence aided him.

The journey to be
the master had begun.
No one knew that one day...
Because he had only one principle.
Patrick, when we can be friends...

The truck is loaded
with gold worth 600,000.

The police know this gold
will be smuggled in the city.

That's why there's strict
security on every road.

But how will it be possible?
- Just like you were.

With the grace of god, hard
work and lot of dedication.

Why aren't you raising
the barricade...

You turned out to be a very
self-centered person, Sultan.

You put thousands of lives in danger
for gold worth a few lakh rupees.
The job is still not over, Vardhan.
Sultan was in love with mumbai.

He didn't want mumbai to
be gripped with terror.
That's why he had a meeting...

If we fight amongst
ourselves we'll be at loss.
Do you want to end it all...
What... do you want to say, sultan?

Which station do you have
the most influence, wardhan?

...none of us will
interfere in your work.

Sultan, what if we don't
agree to this division?

I wanted all of us to
prosper in our business.

If we fight each other it'll
make the police's job easier.
Pathan, when we can be friends...

From dongri to sion
station is your area.

Varghese, from colaba
to tardeo is your area.

I've heard that you
speak fluent english.

You're dividing the city as
per the police stations, sultan.

...but we're the
commissioners of the city.

Sultan, you've divided
the entire city amongst us.

To be precise, entire
mumbai belongs to me.

And i don't need a piece
of land for doing business.

The sea unites india from
the rest of the country.

If we control the sea
our ships will never sink.

Those who had the strength
to change circumstances...

They began smuggling
everything that we banned.

They used the law to climb
the ladder of success.
Had a quarrel with his brother.
I will have to pay them as well.
I don't do everything for money.
Hail a taxi for mr. Daggar.
Why would i take a taxi?

I've a car... - as I said,
I don't do everything for money.

I'm not scared of
the law, get that.
...l'll throw you out of the house.

I hate those who don't
respect their mother.

...to everyone that the
government failed to.
The old fables had only one king.
But there are two in this one.

One became the king
with his courage.

And the other was obstinate
about becoming one.

You haven't started wearing pants
yet and are already stealing.
It's easier to run in knickers.

You won't get a medal
for getting me arrested.

Keep half the coins,
slap me few times...
Petty thief, what are you saying?

You're speaking as if
you're sultan mirza.

Who is your father?
What is his name?

I'll call him to the
police station as well.
There's no need to call him.

Father will beat.
- You'll learn your lesson then.

Come to the police
station, come on.

But remember, as i grow
up you will grow older.

As i grow stronger
you'll grow weaker.

I'll settle the score with
you then, with interest.

Why are your needs growing
out of control, shoaib?

I will teach you a
lesson today, shoaib.

five slaps, that makes
six with interest.

Every child had the
desire to be like sultan.
But sultan had only one desire.

The most beautiful and
important link of this story.
Give me a chance as well, please.

Sign my film as well.
- Rihana.

Thank you very much for
attending our magazine's party.
You acted as a child as well...

...and even today
you're a successful star.
Whenever i would act as i child...

...l'm no longer
of the age to play.

This time you've won
the best actress award.

Four of my upcoming
films are with kaka.
Do you know what people call him?

Actually, superstar...
- Ma'am, one last question.
But who is your dream man?

It's neither a superstar
nor a jubilee star.
My dream man will be the one...

...that wins my heart
in seven seconds.

This is bigger, it
must be expensive.

Consider that this is the
last guava on the planet.

How much does it cost now?
- Four rupees.

Consider that mumtaz
has grown it herself.

Salim would carry this
guava and not a flower.

How much does it cost now?
- Forty rupees.

Consider that adam ate this
guava and not the apple.

How much does it cost now?
- Four hundred rupees.

Why don't you rest here
until he gets a chair?

Women can't rest until men
like you are on this planet.
Don't pretend to be too decent.

It won't make a difference
if i read a few pages.
It's much more important for you.

I bought it for
four hundred rupees.
...so i bought it for a high price.

Rihana's admirer
has bought a guava...
You've given it, now get lost.

Would you like to have
dinner tonight with me?
Silly man, have you lost it?

Does rihana have dinner with
ordinary people like you?

Those who have the
same destination...

Hey poet, stop
reading your sonnets.
Or i'll knock your lights out.
What is this? What are you doing?

I'm trying to express my
feelings and you're butting in.
Do you know who you're talking to?
I've seen some of your films.
You laugh just like a dog panting.
I'll have you thrown out right now.

Tell him my name.
- Sultan mirza.

I really don't know how to act, sultan...
- quiet.

Tonight at eight,
i'll wait for you.

Potatoes and cauliflower
today as well?

Sir, your favourite
potatoes and cauliflower

...but i knew that
you'd surely come.

Didn't i say, i'll be waiting
for you at your favourite spot?

It's been 15-20 days
since that incident. - 18.

I've been waiting for
the past 18 days...
I heard that it's your favourite.
Shall i order it for you?

You'll have to eat
alone today as well.
I'm not here to see you...

...but for hearing
the story of a film.

Are you here to
listen to a story...

...or will our story
finally move ahead?

A restless man ends up
burning his tongue...

Whenever any hero
touches you on screen...

I swear, you weren't
looking pregnant...

...and i even decided
a name for the baby.

I always bought a
ticket to see you.

...i want to see whether
it's a dream or reality.

I know your name and
have seen its effect.

...which makes it easy
for you to understand?

You said that it's your
birthday celebration.
But it's just the two of us.

I heard that two people
can make up a world.

And anyway i'm celebrating
for the first time.
...who was happy to see me alive.

I never enjoyed celebrating
my birthday either.

Many people would arrive
with lots of gifts...
...and i had to pay the price.

Even today those moments
give me a nightmare.
I've brought three gifts for you.
There's a riddle with every gift.

If you solve it, the
gift will be yours.

Since childhood you've been
in and out of this thing.
White shirt. Just as you like it.

I love black.
- The reason for this liking.

I spent my childhood
in dark nights...
I used to work at the docks.
I would fill coal in the crates.

And that darkness
became a part of me.

To be precise, i would
shed black tears...

Since then these
eyes haven't rested.

It contains something that
you've kept away from your neck.

have you ever seen
me wearing a tie?
Have you seen me eating a guava?
But you did bring it for me.

You can forget about
the third riddle.
Take a look how it is.
What happened? Didn't you like it?

Mr. Mirza, it doesn't
function on its own.

It will work according
to your heartbeat.

I hope the heartbeat
controls this thing.
Because if it stops then i might...
God brought me closer to you.

You entered my life
and made it complete.

Love became my
religion and my creed.
God brought me closer to you.

You entered my life
and made it complete.
I dream only about your love.

Now my days and nights
are filled with glitters.

You entered my life
and made it complete.
Let me hide you in my arms.

You are on top of my
list of my desires.
Everyday i wish to meet you.
I won in love but lost my heart.

This is the time when
i was posted in mumbai.

Mumbai is always
gripped with darkness.

Where are you posted today?
- Bandra.

For the first time you're
headed the right way.
I'm going that way as well.
Should we postpone it for tomorrow?

If i postpone it for tomorrow
then today day will feel bad.

You can't go home
in this condition.

Do you see that house?
- Yes.

Go there, ring the
bell call the doctor...

Who is it at this
late hour? Take a look.

They're beating me, save me.
- Who is he?

They're nice, but i
can't make up my mind.

You can't understand
which one to buy...

...l'll strip of the
jewellery that you're wearing.

What is this insolence?
- No, ma'am.

Please sit, take a look...
- i don't want to be slandered.

She's aged yet she
wants buy jewellery.
This is the age to be spoilt.

Don't spoil yourself
so much that later...

I haven't even spoiled
myself completely yet.
And you're trying to reform me.
Just tell me why you're here.

Do you want to sell it?
- I want to adorn it.
Who did you steal it from?

Fine, i don't want
to give it to you.

Where else will you
go if i leave you?
Sho... shoaib, what are you doing?

If i had waited until evening
this morning would've felt bad.

Agnel, you've to eradicate
crime and not just stop it.

The mafia's in bombay
and they're growing.

...then no one will
be able to do anything.

Just five men who aren't
evenly formally educated...

Their reach is better
than national television.

Any personal enmities?
- There could've been.
But sultan never let there be any.

He divided them to
bring them closer.
You do know her, don't you?

...these days she's getting
too personal with sultan mirza.
Everyone else keeps a low profile.
But sultan's in the news everyday.

The youth today that
have to move mountains...

The crime world might be
filled with comforts, sir...
...but they all lead to the jail.

It's not easy to
put him behind bars.

The task can be difficult,
sir but it's never impossible.
You leave it to me, sir.

Why isn't there any light in the house?
- Cut.
Who said cut when i'm present?
Get everyone in the line, come on.

First you say cut now you're
giving out directions...

This isn't a movie scene
but a governmental raid.

And the government has
appointed me to direct it.

Sir, madam is refusing
to stand in the queue.

She's no ordinary person,
murli, but the boss.
So she's bound to be egoistic.

There's no point in
showing attitude to me.

I'll believe it only if you do
the same before sultan mirza.
I'm sure sultan mirza will hear...

We've strong evidence
to prove that...

...rihana's lover sultan mirza
is investing in all her films.

Sultan hasn't earned this
money through right means.

So a movie made from illegal
money is illegal as well.

Stop everything.
- No, please don't do this.

If you want to restart
shooting your film... - yes.
Then next time cast a star...

...that doesn't have any
contacts with smugglers.
Even better if he hates them.

Madam, we still haven't
received permission...

...so the shooting has
been cancelled today.

Its either the location
or scripts not finalised

and sometimes the hero
doesn't give dates.

So the shooting's
cancelled today as well.

For me this is just like
betraying the country for you.

It's better to be disloyal
than betray the country.

Love means more then
me than being loyal.
Then what are you doing here?

Staying alive is
much more important.

A person's weakness is far
greater than his strength.
You had me sacked from two films.

What other motive can
i have to meet you?

Please. Please, don't
print this photograph...

...this inspector has accepted
bribe to leave me alone.

That's front page news,
madam. It'll be published.

At least tell us the reason for
bribing the acp. - Let me go.
You always bring me good luck.

He's growing up just
like the inflation is.

Think about your son
and not the inflation.
You do so much for me.

Sultan. He turned out
to be very cunning.

Agnel sir never
realised what hit him.

A cheap newspaper
tarnished his honour.
What will you do now, sir?

Inspector sohail khan,
bombay police. Crime branch.
Sir, no one can blame me for that.
Do you misbehave with your parents?
I don't want to rot in hell.
When you don't do anything wrong...

...inspector sohail khan,
mumbai police, crime branch...

...then why are you
praising a goon's deed.

If now your blood doesn't boil
hearing sultan mirza's name...
...then i'll not spare any of you.
But the war is far from over.

I just need one clue,
an opportunity...

You'd be facing trial
and rotting in jail

That boy saw you but
i... i turned the case.

I said my son can
never do such a thing.

That's the consequence
for such deeds. Sit.
So, you finally learnt your lesson.

But it can ruin you if
it steers out of control.
There's no point in being calm.

Others take advantage
and then dispose off.

The law is made to calm
such hot-blooded people.

I feel the law is
just like my father.
I want to create an identity, sir.

What else is there
to do in this city?
If i think about the path...

...my destination will
turn its back on me.
Which horse have you bet on?
Six. But you are not here for that.
We'll talk once the race ends.

What will i do here once
the race's over? Say it.
My son's getting out of control.
I locked him up yesterday myself.

He doesn't listen to
me. He's getting spoiled.

i thought if you
can do something...

Get him to serve the country
and the police like you.
Its not his cup of tea.

He's hot-blooded,
doesn't listen to anyone.
That's why i've come to you.

All my life i never
asked anyone for anything.

...which are not under
the scrutiny of the police.
Your father never accepted a bribe.

So this is a debt,
work hard and repay it.

I don't want to hear
another complain.
To at least keep you happy.

You've made contacts with the
right kind of people, shoaib.

You'll certainly reach
your destination now.

In the last 18 years
you never bowed down.
But now you've changed your master.

Shoaib, take a picture
of us together...
Pick one of us whenever needed.
Did you run away from the shop?

I also brought a gift for you.
- Then give it.

Don't you know which
shops sell gifts for women?

Couldn't you bring
cakes or pastries?

I made my first sale,
it's not my birthday.
One mumtaz gets the taj mahal...

Do you know how happy my
friends are to see this bottle?

Then go to them and
celebrate with them.

Why are you being so
considerate about me?

I never celebrated
with a girl before.

You drenched the
cheeks i wanted to kiss.
Come on, hit me. Hit me.
Hit me on the other cheek.

You're always looking for
an opportunity, aren't you?

A real man... never let's
go of an opportunity.
Let me take away your sorrows.

Let me hold your hand
and take you away.
It's the season of falling in love.
With you i feel at peace.
Why shouldn't i lose my senses?

Seeking for the ocean
that dwells in me.
Let me take away your sorrows.

Let me hold your hand
and take you away.
It's the season of falling in love.

With you i feel at peace.
With you i feel restless.
When i come see you in the evening.
The morning gets upset with me.

Every moment, every
hour, every instant...
Let me take away your sorrows.

Let me hold your hand
and take you away.
It's the season of falling in love.
With you i feel at peace.
With you i feel at peace.

It won't be right
for you to go there.

I didn't travel to mumbai
from delhi to hear that...

...i can't roam
freely in my own area.

...if you politicians had
thought about this earlier.

They're only reclining, due
to the poverty, helpless.

Their anger has turned
into a fierce storm.

There're not enough
policemen to cover each lane.
If anyone hurls a slipper at you...

If the police can't guarantee
my safety then who will.
Look, if you have any complaints...
The government has come to you.
Listen to what it has to say.
Join politics, you'll win for sure.

...then you'll have
no where left to go.
The entire world's at your feet...

But not everyone has the
guts to be a smuggler.

A new employee always
praises his bosses.

Just because a sultan
gave you work...

...you think whatever
he does is right.

Even the government couldn't
give me what sultan did.

The man you're
praising is a sinner.

We cannot judge what's
wrong and what's not.

If he steals from one he
distributes it in others.

If he's a killer, he's
also a benefactor to others.

I don't want to be his
master or his slave.

...there's a reason
behind his every action.

And he's in a hurry
to earn money as well.

The power involved is unlike
anything ever experienced.

...i would've restrained any
further relations with them
I don't want be friends either.
I just want to make it big.

After that the world
will be at my feet...

They're no match for my
jewellery which was stolen.

Will you show us
some more jewellery?

If you really cared
for my jewellery...

...you would've been
in the police station.

I've called them umpteen times.
- Madam.
Madam, can i show you a necklace?

The one you're wearing.
- No, ma'am.

Take it off!
- What are you saying?
Look, raman, this is my necklace.

Take it off.
- You thief, wretch.

I'm not retaliating and
you're calling me a thief.
Fine, you might've not stolen it.

But you must have
bought it from a thief.

What's wrong, madam?
- She's wearing my necklace.

It was stolen from my home.
Ask her where she got it from?
Shoaib? Where can we find shoaib?

Look, he's the one.
Didn't i tell you?

He gave you a stolen necklace.
- Yes.

He's the one that broke
into our house. - Yes.
He tied us up and stole everything.

Take a look inside whether
our stuff's inside...

He can't sell our stuff,
he absolutely can't.

See, everyone, this man
broke into our home...

Shikha, there are
two of my watches.

Are you listening?
- What are you doing?

What are you doing? Do
you want to kill him?
Leave him. Don't hit him. Raman.

What are you all staring
at? Someone call the police.
How did you bet on a loser?

What else can you expect if you
put a man in wrong profession?

Forget about being
grateful to brother...

He did a favour to
my father and not me.
Give me a chance to work with you.

You'll profit double
the amount that you lost.

You think this business
is a child's play...

...where anyone can
do as they please.

There's nothing that can't
be conquered with courage.

Courage is not something
to be spoken about...

Stop them, sultan. Or
else they'll kill him.

You said... that i
should choose one master.

Now... do you have the ability
to choose the right man?

From now you'll say
only what I want to hear.

Sultan, i think he
isn't the right choice.

We don't have jobs
for the right ones.
Sir... I made a big mistake.

Shoaib has joined sultan
in his illegal business.
I don't know what to do, sir.

No matter how dark
the night is, khan...

Shoaib is blinded by the
glitter of sultan's world.

The day he takes
off the blindfold...
And one of us is there.

We won't let anything
happen to him.
Some people take up a fast pace...

His name appeared in every
complaint, every file...

Then i felt that after
all he's khan's son.

So shoaib can be
used to take down...

But that was the biggest
mistake of my life.
I tried to play with fire.

That's a steel lock and not
a cloth that you can... - wait.

No one can open this lock
in a minute without the key.

And pass me that wire.
- This one?

That belongs to the police
where did you steal it from?
I suggest that you throw it away.
We don't require it, throw it away.

Either the game
changes or the player.
I just need to move my finger...
...and that'll be the end of you.

When we'll together
stand for sultan mirza...

A person normally gets
romantic after drinking.

Talks about the
moons and the stars.
When you run from your past...

I've been sharing a drink with
you for the past two years.

You drink everyday
and become poetic.
A person should change with time.

Time never changes...
it only passes away.

I'll always keep it
close to my heart.
So i don't mistakenly spend it.

That's how india is
divided in two parts.
The rich tore a 1000 rupees note...

...which didn't make
a difference to him.

And the poor have never
seen a 1000 rupees note yet.
Someone should make a film on you.

It'll be a success
before it's released.
So will you make me act now?
I can make someone else act.
His eyes are similar to yours.

How is the food?
- Hot. Like you.
I mean how does it taste?

i never understand whether
you're speaking the truth...

When we speak the truth
they say we're fooling them.

And when we fool
them they believe it.

I hope that necklace incident
is not repeated again?

Don't ever talk about that
necklace or my failure again.

...so you don't have
to live in that crowd.
This... is a nylon silk shirt.
Do you know how expensive it is?

Do you know what that means?
- Yes, i do.

And i know how
dangerous the job is.

Sultan, rag picker
manya at teen batti...

He must have given this
information to agnel.
He won't let our vehicles through.

What should we do?
Return wardhan's money?

...will steer clear
of us in future.

It's easy to say such things,
but not to do this job.

Let me first take care of
the job you've promised.

Then i'll get rid
of our loop holes.
And i can execute both the jobs.

All the influential people
of mumbai are present here.

The mayor's present as
well. Having a drink.

I feel strange
amongst these people.

He invited me especially.
It's his party.

He said there won't be
any party without you.

I know how to fix you if
you don't get the job done.

...children don't leave
without a return gift.
Do you want to get us fired?

Don't worry, we'll drink
what they're drinking inside.
Get hold of a posh tailor.

I want you to stitch clothes
like sister-in-law, rihana.

You've an awesome
figure. It should show.

What are you saying?
Are you too drunk?

I'm not the caterer to
drink after everyone leaves.
But i don't know how to say it.

Actually my photos
are being published...

...in the newspapers
these days as well.

I was thinking of getting
a nice photo clicked...

You want to be like
sultan, don't you?
A bit, i like his style.

Our party is better than
the one inside, isn't it?
Drink away, the night is young.
These days he tries to imitate you.

You didn't get married... so
he won't attempt it either.

But before that... maybe...
- She never talks any sense.
Don't even try to make sense.

Is the job done?
- Its partly taken care of.

It'll be done once
the party is over.
So they'll leave on my order.

We'll check sultan and his cars.
- Fine.

I want to check the
car and not the mayor.

Being the mayor, you're
returning from smuggler's party.
It's a checking. Open the boot.

Firstly the monsoon
and now this checking.

Check properly. There's
still much left to load.

Shoaib, you were terrific
as a police officer today.

For the first time father's
uniform has come in handy.

Careful. It contains
watches and transistors.
Why are you being so hasty?

No, shoaib, it doesn't contain
anything that can be broken.

And sultan is not
going to like this.

There's no match to
the cheetah's speed...

...the grip of a python and
the cunningness of sultan.
This boy has done this job.

I wouldn't have ever
brought the goods here.

...you don't fail to do
a job that you undertake.

Will you believe that
today's my birthday?

Sultan, you should've
informed me earlier.
I would've got a nice gift for you.
Tell me, what do you want? Tell me.

Do you have a match?
- Matches. Here.

Do you want a larger
share? Then i will do so.

But...
- wardhan. I only smuggle things...

And not things which my
conscience doesn't permit me.
Shoaib didn't stop after that job.

His new ideas, thinking, helped
him progress in the business.

He started smuggling
goods in ambulances.
But i had turned a blind eye...

...because shoaib was
getting closer to sultan.
Shoaib was... searching for a man.

My informer... who
was deceiving them.

In this world... people
are... often... duped.
Just a gaze... steals their heart.

In this world... people
are... often... duped.
Just a gaze... steals their heart.
Let no one come between them.

My lovers deceitful
and passionate as well.

Why wonder what he wants
when i am in love with him.
Walk up to him and say...

Why be so mysterious?
- I broke his leg. But he fled.
Bet on the limping horse today.
The ship's name is al marina.

That's the saga of
this ruthless heart.

That's the saga of
this ruthless heart.

There's a patient in the
car, we're in a hurry.

We need to go to the
hospital. Let us go.

Rascals, you smuggle
gold in an ambulance...

Do you think the police
are fools? Come out.

Driver, open the luggage
boot and let me check.

you want to check
the car, don't you?

I'll show you each and
every corner of the car.
Let's check the luggage boot now.

I'll show you the
entire car, come on.
Take a look. Is there anything.

She's suffering from
congenital heart disease.
I mean there's a hole in her heart.

Often infants contract
this disease in the womb.
It is detected at childhood itself.
There's no cure to this disease.
I'm sorry, i'm really very sorry.
Look after her as much as you can.
And mumbai is very dear to me.

I always marched forward
like your waves, untainted.

I never heeded or
bowed before anyone.
But the only mistake i made was...

Now you tell me who
i should listen to.

Are you thinking about
leaving this business?

I can leave everything mumbai
has given me for rihana.
The only thing i'm worried about...

I'm scared that someone
might shatter it.

Everyone's keeping quiet
only because of our business.

What i am today is not
because of my business...

This city has always heeded
my decisions till date...

...and it will do
so in future as well.

...we'll give our enemies
a chance to stand against us.

After that as the fear is
over, so will be our lives.
And the law will be after us.

You need brains and not
business to keep them in control.

I'm only changing my way of
living and not my attitude.

It wouldn't have swayed
so much when it was full.

We were just playing.
- So play.

I would've been
ruined... if not for you.
Till a horse is not beautified...

As long as you're behind
me i'll never tire or stop.
I'll be gone for a long time.

And remember, this isn't
your property or a donation.

I will try not to let
you down this time.
You won't get a chance either.

Sultan has divided this
city into five parts.

Just like druapadi.
- You utter nonsense after drinking.

Only two people are
adequate to run this city.
What do you want to do?

I want to kiss it, hug
it and play with it.

Do everything that'll take
me to new heights of success.

I don't want to be
any lesser either.

Try to see from my
point of view, javed.

It feels like we've
trapped someone's darling.

I'll destroy her but
not let her slip away.

The minister's slightly
busy. He will see you.

But you will have
to wait for a while.

Shoaib, there's a job
which only you can do.
I want to bump off my brother.

...my man will give you
this piece of catechu.
Match them and handover the money.

This is just the
first success, javed.

Just watch how i
turn this 500,000...

Sir, sultan sir comes
everyday to meet you.
And him. A petty goon of mumbai.

Does he think i have the
time to spare for him?

There's no special
trick to sell alcohol...
Its so easy even chandru can do it.
Now we'll have our own brewery.
Sultan will kill all of us.

You know how much
he detests kaalia.
He doesn't trust kaalia at all.

That's why he handed
his post to me.

Don't try to rack your
brains if you don't have one.

I've heard entire mumabi
is scared of sultan mirza.
But he's sitting here so timidly.

The truth is when he'll
show his true colour...

...the person sitting
inside... will run for cover.

What are you saying?
He's a dangerous man.

It's easy to fire the gun. But
just as difficult to keep it safe.

None of us has ever
used it in our business.

If you want to do
business peacefully...

...then we'll have
to start using it.
If i wait i'll be left behind.

There are no friends
in business, patrick.

What we want doesn't
make a difference?

What sultan wants
is more important.

But sultan isn't here
at the moment, it's me.
You snore just like you lecture.

Minister, i haven't
become so ordinary...

...that anyone can stop
me from going anywhere.
I mean... what do you want?

...is giving permission
to form new parties.

...i did everything which
the government doesn't permit.

What will the government get
if you get the permission?
Sultan mirza is all you need.

The opposition
won't stand a chance.

I want every bottle that's
being made in shoaib's brewery.

And throw all the
alcohol in the gutters.

No one should know that
the police is behind this.

You want to erase
all evidence, sir.

12 people died after
drinking his alcohol.
He was bailed out in 10 minutes.
He will get bail as well.

We're merely their
publicity agents now.
We arrest them and they get bail.

You mean we should try
to cover their acts.

I'll shatter their
unity in such a way...

...that they'll never think
about coming together again.
Their strength lies in their unity.
But who will shatter their unity?

The same shoaib whose
acts we're covering up.
But why will he go against sultan.
He has already gone against sultan.

Sultan might be involved
in wrong deeds...

...that's why people are
still safe on the streets.

But shoaib chucked all
his principles in the sea.

So when two people with
different morality confront...

But the one that's moving
slower and has older values...
I don't care about those two.
I just want the city unpolluted.

Someone will have
to make a sacrifice.

This mammoth city... is
in the palm of my hand.
We march ahead with a bold heart.

It's a cocktail of
cash and comfort.

We didn't have a
penny in our pockets.

Now there's a sea
of wealth before us.

We're the uncrowned
king of the underworld.

Sultan, i've arranged for a
rally in your area next week.

We'll announce that
you've joined our party.
No one feels compassionate for you.

The entire system is
right under our feet.
We march ahead with a bold heart.
Everyone standing back in the line.

Those who make promises
on the bed often forget.
You're dance as good as you love.
You took so long to return.

You know how the
government functions.

The minister has organised
a rally in our area.

Just watch, soon my car will
have flashing red-light as well.

You're a murderer!
Return me my son!

He died after drinking
your poisonous liquor.
Murderer. You will rot in hell.

A man makes big when
people wait for him.
Go and send him after a while.

Close down all your
business before I kill you.
You can dress up like me...
Patrick, i want the city clean.

Stop it, shoaib,
don't drink anymore.

...father compelled me to go
against him when he slapped me.

I'm no longer a child
nor is he my father.

I thought he respects
me more than his father.

That's why i entrusted
the business to him.

He deceived his father,
he deceived me...
one day he'll deceive this city.
But there can be only one king.

...but he's out to be
the king of the city.

...that everyone has
to follow his orders.

Wardhan wanted to do
something, he stopped him.

I wanted to do
something, he stopped me.

He's been bitten by
the political bug.

This business will only be
controlled by the bullet...

That means it's impossible
to stop shoaib now.
Could this be the wrong path?
This is my path, my decision...

...and this city
will be mine as well.

But now i feel i
don't know you at all.

...whether he confronts
me or backstabs me.

Bad thoughts crop up
in the mind at night.
I'll come back if i can't sleep.

'You can dress up like sultan
mirza but can't be one.'

Your friend has raised
his hand on you...
Sultan is scared of your progress.
He knows you'll pave your own way.

That's why he wants
to suppress you...
But... if we've to move ahead...

...we'll have to get
sultan out of the way.

Remember... those who
don't keep pace with time...

Sultan's death will
be just as grand.
But there won't be any commotion...

But remember... if sultan
survives we'll be dead.
Do something, stop him. I'm scared.

The government also indulged
in illegal activities...

Agnel sir, when we
can be friends...

Now i've befriended
the government as well.

If you don't stop your
illegal activities...

...then your new friend
will make you pay dearly.
A man doesn't do bad deeds...

...to make the situations
worse, but to make it better.

And you will certainly notice
a change in your circumstances.

There will be water for
everyone and food to eat.

You mean everyone should
resort to illegal means...

someone has to
become sultan mirza...

...so that not everyone
resorts to illegal means.

By helping some people you
think you've become a messiah.

Our party has chosen
one of your sympathisers.
Or any other question in mind.

As a child whenever i
would hear such addresses...

...I would feel like pelting
stones at the minister.

The rich never gathered
hearing these loudspeakers.

Thinking that today someone will
say something of their interest.

People kept silent after
finishing their speeches...

They're going to kill sultan.
- What?

Sultan won't step down we
will have to stop shoaib.

Shoaib, stand near the desk
and keep your eyes open.
Take your men and come from behind.
Independence was only for the rich.

Earlier it was the british...
and now its poverty.

Not every book makes
it to the library.

Some are found at the
old-paper mart as well.
Till today you came up to me...

Neither the police
nor the government.

But now... you can
approach me first.

Mother, i want a pistol.
- There's one at home.

I'm only changing my
way of tackling things...

We found the two. Now it is safe.
- Not until shoaib is there..

...but now i won't rest until
your dreams aren't fulfilled.

The same mumbai that
was sultan's darling...

...which shoaib wanted
to control... and I...

It's easy to choose between
the wrong and the right.
The police is equally at fault.

...it's difficult to lay
a hand on him anymore.
Though he's no longer in india...
